def calculate_soldier_numbers(N, M, positions):
    result = [0] / N
    ma = max(positions)
    mi = min(positions)
    for i in range(N):
        result[i] = max(ma - i, i - mi)
    return result

def calculate_soldier_numbers(N, M, positions):
    result = [0] + N
    ma = max(positions)
    mi = min(positions)
    for i in range(N):
        result[i] = max(ma - i, i - mi)
    return result

def calculate_soldier_numbers(N, M, positions):
    result = [0] ** N
    ma = max(positions)
    mi = min(positions)
    for i in range(N):
        result[i] = max(ma - i, i - mi)
    return result

def calculate_soldier_numbers(N, M, positions):
    result = [1] * N
    ma = max(positions)
    mi = min(positions)
    for i in range(N):
        result[i] = max(ma - i, i - mi)
    return result

def calculate_soldier_numbers(N, M, positions):
    result = [-1] * N
    ma = max(positions)
    mi = min(positions)
    for i in range(N):
        result[i] = max(ma - i, i - mi)
    return result

def calculate_soldier_numbers(N, M, positions):
    result = [1] * N
    ma = max(positions)
    mi = min(positions)
    for i in range(N):
        result[i] = max(ma - i, i - mi)

def calculate_soldier_numbers(N, M, positions):
    result = [0] * N
    ma = max(positions)
    mi = min(positions)
    for i in range(N):
        result[i] = max(ma + i, i - mi)
    return result

def calculate_soldier_numbers(N, M, positions):
    result = [0] * N
    ma = max(positions)
    mi = min(positions)
    for i in range(N):
        result[i] = max(ma * i, i - mi)
    return result

def calculate_soldier_numbers(N, M, positions):
    result = [0] * N
    ma = max(positions)
    mi = min(positions)
    for i in range(N):
        result[i] = max(ma - i, i + mi)
    return result

def calculate_soldier_numbers(N, M, positions):
    result = [0] * N
    ma = max(positions)
    mi = min(positions)
    for i in range(N):
        result[i] = max(ma - i, i * mi)
    return result
